text: I don't think so I think
writing it's always been challenging to
make a career as a writer I'm not
convinced that it's harder today than it
was 100 years ago I'm certainly not
convinced as a black person it was
harder today than it was 50 years ago
I've been going back through all the old
uh archives of the New York no black
people writing none none I'm not I'm not
trying to diss the New Yorker you go
back through the Atlantic and see very
few black people writing for the
Atlantic it is certainly not harder
today that's such a huge part of my
identity as an African-American it's
very
difficult for me to say my dad was a
high school dropout who went off into
the war um my mom grew up in the
projects in West Baltimore it's very
difficult for me to say to be moan how
hard it is for writers I mean that's
just it's a
difficult thing I think the
audience well not the audience I think
maybe the number of people who can do it
will shrink so it may be harder to do um
I'm not totally sure that it's a bad
thing I think writing should be hard I
think the only people who probably at
the end of the day should be writing
maybe this is overstatement I don't know
but I think at the end of the day the
people who I want to read are the people
who would be socially dysfunctional if
they weren't writing I want to read
people who need to write okay just like
when I go to see a film I want to read
somebody that needs to make movies um I
want people who write like their life is
dependent on it
um people who are halfway doing it
should go be you know should go work on
Wall Street or whatever you should not
be a sellout at writing it doesn't pay
enough um and the work is too hard and
I've been in jobs with it with people
like that those people need another
career you know it's like being a
sellout is being a teacher why why why
would you sell out and go teach go ruin
lies like really like that's what you're
going to so why sell out and be a writer
so I waste my life reading through your
bad awful halfway done stuff no no no it
should be hard it should be hard the
wages should be tough and if you stick
with it if you stick with it it's it's
an endurance War how bad do you want
it and I think I'm mostly a writer
because I can't do anything else I don't
have any other skills I mean it's all I
ever wanted and I've only been good at
things that I really really wanted in my
life um
I think that's a good thing I actually
do I don't Twitter I don't Twitter um I
have nothing against Twitter
um I I need more space where I'm
disconnected from the world I don't need
to be more connected
virtually I need to be more connected
with regular people I need to be less
connected
virtually I'm not a lite I'm not
obviously I'm a blogger so I'm not
completely against it
I need uh as much time as I as as
possible um
disconnected I hate traveling because I
miss my family terribly one of the great
things about traveling though is the
complete sort of Disconnect while you're
on a plane um that's a great thing I I I
I need more of that I don't need less
than that
